properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO,MEMBER_NAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_COUNT,CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY = 2 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO,MEMBER_NAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_COUNT,CREATE_DATE,B.STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_NAME, ATTACHMENT_CHANGE, ATTACHMENT_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ? ,BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ATTACHMENT_NAME = ? ,ATTACHMENT_CHANGE = ? ,ATTACHMENT_PATH = ? ,UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
